00013 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType>
00014 bool ParamsMapCore<KeyType, ValueType>::exists(const KeyType& key) const{
00015         typename ParamsMapCore<KeyType, ValueType>::const_iterator it=find(key);
00016         return (it != this->end());
00017 }

00019 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType>
00020 bool ParamsMapCore<KeyType, ValueType>::remove(const KeyType& key){
00021         if(exists(key)){
00022                 erase(find(key));
00023         }
00024         return false;
00025 }

00032 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType>
00033 ValueType ParamsMapCore<KeyType, ValueType>::get(const KeyType& key) const{
00034         if(exists(key)){
00035                 typename ParamsMapCore<KeyType, ValueType>::const_iterator it=find(key);
00036                 return (it->second);
00037         }
00038         ValueType d;
00039         return d;
00040 }

00058 typename ParamsMapCore<KeyType, ValueType>::iterator ParamsMapCore<KeyType, ValueType>::each(){
